cards.text: A computer can be used for performing various tasks which may be programming or simple calculations. Is it True or False?
A computer is a device that can operate very complex task at a very short time. Is it True or False?
Which unit of second = One trillionth of a second (1/1000000000000) or \( 10^{-12} \) ?
Computers can perform complex calculations with great accuracy. Is it True or False?
A computer is a machine which is able to perform multiple tasks without any help. Is it True or False?
cards.tip: Computer processes raw data provided by the user.

cards.text: A computer is a diligent machine. Is it True or False?
cards.tip: Computers perform all tasks with same level of speed and accuracy.

cards.text: A computer cannot store a huge amount of data permanently. Is it True or False?
cards.tip: The data stored permanently can be retrieved whenever needed.

cards.text: How much does 1024 MegaBytes equal to? (1 GigaByte or 1 TeraByte)
A computer is a versatile machine. Is it True or False?
cards.tip: A computer has the capacity to do multiple tasks at the same time.

cards.text: A computer has a high level of reliability. Is it True or False?
cards.tip: Computer components have very high life span and its parts do not wear and tear out easily.

description: Read the questions carefully and answer the questions.
